metadata.title: Radiological and Clinical Characteristics of a Military Outbreak of Pandemic H1N1 2009 Influenza Virus Infection

abstract.original_text: Objective: To describe detailed clinical and radiological features of the pandemic H1N1 2009 influenza viral infection among healthy young males in a semiclosed institutionalized setting.

sentences.segment_text: Objective : To describe detailed clinical and radiological features of the pandemic H1N1 2009 influenza viral infection among healthy young males in a semiclosed institutionalized setting .

abstract.original_text: A total of 18 patients confirmed with the pandemic H1N1

sentences.segment_text: A total of 18 patients confirmed with the pandemic H1N1
